title: APPROPRIATIONS – DEPARTMENT OF PARKS AND RECREATION – Relates to the appropriation to the Department of Parks and Recreation for fiscal year 2026.
subject: APPROPRIATIONS
PARKS AND RECREATION

actions.description: Introduced, read first time, referred to JRA for Printing
